Package org.seed.core.api

package org.seed.core.api
  • Class
    Description
    AbstractFunctionContext
    Abstract base class of all function contexts and an implementation of FunctionContext.
    ApplicationException
    An ApplicationException can be used to abort an operation with an error message.
    BatchOperation
    A BatchOperation is a bulk database operation.
    CallbackEventType
    Enumeration of all callback event types
    CallbackFunction<T extends EntityObject>
    CallbackFunction is the base interface of all callback functions.
    CallbackFunctionContext
    A CallbackFunctionContext is the context in which a CallbackFunction is executed.
    ClientProvider
    ClientProvider provides access to client-side (UI) functionalities.
    DataSource
    A DataSource represents a named predefined SQL or HQL query.
    DataSourceProvider
    DataSourceProvider provides access to DataSource objects.
    DBCursor<T extends EntityObject>
    A DBCursor represents a query cursor in the database.
    EntityFilter
    An EntityFilter represents a named predefined EntityObject filter.
    EntityObject
    EntityObject is the base interface of all entity objects.
    EntityObjectProvider
    EntityObjectProvider provides functionalities to access and manipulate EntityObject instances.
    EntityTransformer
    An EntityTransformer represents a named predefined EntityObject transformation.
    FormFunction
    FormFunction is the base interface of all form functions.
    FormFunctionContext
    A FormFunctionContext is the context in which a FormFunction is executed.
    FunctionContext
    FunctionContext is the base interface of all function contexts.
    Job
    Job is the base interface of all jobs.
    JobContext
    A JobContext is the context in which a Job is executed.
    Mail
    A Mail is a template that can be used to create an email.
    MailProvider
    MailProvider provides access to e-mail functionalities.
    ParameterProvider
    ParameterProvider provides access to parameters.
    RestClient
    A RestClient is a client for REST services.
    RestFunction
    RestFunction is the base interface of all rest functions.
    RestFunction.MethodType
    Enumeration of all HTTP request method types.
    RestFunctionContext
    A RestFunctionContext is the context in which a RestFunction is executed.
    RestProvider
    RestProvider provides access to RestClient instances.
    Status
    A Status represents the status of an EntityObject.
    StoredProcedureCall
    A StoredProcedureCall represents a call of a stored procedure.
    StoredProcedureProvider
    StoredProcedureProvider provides access to stored procedures.
    TransformationFunction<S extends EntityObject,T extends EntityObject>
    TransformationFunction is the base interface of all transformation functions.
